Description:
Just Spectacular.
Neat as a pin, perfectly positioned, northerly orientation, alfresco living and drive through access to the yard from the garage – Just Spectacular. This 2 year old home comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, open plan central living, kitchen & dining area flowing onto the north facing alfresco space and the meticulously maintained gardens. Stone bench tops, 900mm oven, ducted heating, reverse cycle cooling & a quality finish throughout the home coupled with its position in the View Bella Estate being within close proximity to the Shopping centre and public transport, makes this an ideal purchase for those looking at a quality finish in a perfect location with nothing left to do.

Description:
Lot 818- Stage 8 Coriyule Estate
This allotment measures 388m2 and has a 16.8m frontage. Now pre-selling with Titles expected early 2018. The Coriyule Estate Curlewis is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to Portarlington Ferry Service, beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that this wonderful area has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also right on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. Our estate gives you the freedom to create without the frustrating restrictions developers often place on the new estates. The National Broadband Network (NBN) is in the Coriyule Estate to provide you with highest quality internet experience. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes if this allotment isn't for you. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
Lifestyle change on 5 acres (approx)
This property will allow that lifestyle change you’ve been wanting for! Located approx. 15 minutes from Geelong and only a few minutes into Drysdale and Portarlington this residence on approx. 5 acres boasts a convenient location and great family property.
Featuring 4 bedrooms, including the master bedroom with ensuite/WIR and separate parents retreat. The updated family bathroom services the 3 minor bedrooms downstairs, a separate study, open plan modern kitchen, dining and family area with direct views across the property and a second sitting room with open fire. The original garage has been transformed into a rumpus room or would make a fabulous office area for those needing to work from home and have clients drop by. A major advantage to this acreage is it is serviced by town water and natural gas. Zoned ducted gas heating, split system cooling and gas plumbed BBQ and alfreco entertaining area.
Outside lies endless opportunities with a lovely natural vista providing the perfect back drop to outdoor living. The double carport offers undercover car accommodation, plus a large shed provides a great working space and storage. Three paddocks, chook shed and plenty of established trees provide privacy around the perimeter.
Situated near to the fabulous Curlewis Golf Club and close to the Leopold and Drysdale school precinct, this is the complete lifestyle package
For further information TEXT 'portarlington' to 0428444841
GO TO www.whitfordproperty.com.au TO VIEW MORE PROPERTIES EXCLUSIVE TO OUR WEBSITE ONLY

Description:
Almost brand new, room for the boat/caravan!
Just 6mths old, there is simply nothing to do here other than enjoy your beautiful new home and the exceptional lifestyle that Curlewis offers!
Here's just some of the things you'll love about living here:
- Open-plan north facing kitchen/dining/living beaming with natural light
- Master bedroom with large walk-in robe and ensuite
- 2 further bedrooms with built-in robes that share a central bathroom
- Plenty of lawn for the kids/grandkids to play on
- Large side gates providing plenty of room to tuck the boat, van or trailer away
- Year 'round comfort provided by central heating and split system cooling
- Incredibly low maintenance gardens
- Surrounded by amazing wineries, beaches
- Walking distance to the Curlewis Shopping Centre
- Moments to Drysdale Village and only 15mins to Geelong CBD
Stop reading, start calling!

Description:
IDEALLY LOCATED FAMILY HOME
Perfectly positioned, and only 18 months old, this immaculate family home is in a great location, conveniently located within easy walking distance to the Curlewis shopping centre, medical centre, schools and public transport. Established on an allotment of 536m2 (approx.), this impressive, north facing family home offers a relaxed, quiet lifestyle which will appeal to professionals, investors, first home buyers and families. If you're looking to downsize on space but not wanting to compromise on quality then look no further than this modern home. This 3 bedroom home with 2 separate living zones and alfresco join effortlessly with each other and internal access through a double car garage. The master bedroom found at the front of the home includes a walk-in wardrobe and full ensuite, whilst a further 2 bedrooms and a separate bathroom are towards the rear of the home all with built in robes. At the heart of the home is a spacious kitchen with ample storage and a walk-in pantry, which overlooks the living and dining area in an interactive open plan setting with direct access to the alfresco area. The alfresco area has a well-kept, low maintenance rear yard offering plenty of space for all members of the family to enjoy. Offering all modern comforts, a wall mounted electric fire heater and 2 split system air conditioning keeps things temperate all year round. Curlewis allows you to be a part of a relaxed atmosphere of a coastal-country town whilst staying connected to Geelong, only a short 20-minute drive. Immerse yourself in the Bellarine's best food, wine, parks, leisure and historical attractions. Organise your inspection today, this opportunity is one not to be missed, and your new lifestyle starts here.

Description:
Elite Bayside Address With Stunning Views
Where else will you find a spectacular new home with bay views at this price? Baywater Estate in Curlewis is emerging as an elite coastal suburb, where designer homes capture panoramic views over calm glistening waters toward the You Yangs and the nightlights of Geelong. Beach walks and boat ramps are only moments away or laze the day away around a saltwater pool in the privacy of your very own coastal sanctuary.
- Set on 676sqm (approx.) in the Baywater Estate, surrounded by beautiful homes and parklands
- Walk to the bay beach 500m away, an ever-changing backdrop of fishing boats and passing ships
- Outdoor entertaining zones extend out across two levels to capture northern sun and water views
- Striking and modern façade with pitched roof, coastal weatherboards, and architectural glazing
- Downstairs is family living at its finest, a light filled open plan domain opening out to an alfresco
- Timber laminate flooring creates seamless flow, through versatile living spaces for everyday life
- Heightened ceilings throughout the main living areas further enhance the sense of space and light
- Northern sun floods the modern kitchen/living/dining, illuminating the central hub of the home
- The well-equipped chef's kitchen features Miele double ovens, 90cm gas cooktop, and dishwasher
- Pendant lights and white cabinetry shine against a contrasting vintage tile backsplash for full effect
- A vast stone island has room for many, whilst a butler's pantry keeps small appliances out of sight
- Living flows to an alfresco with café blinds that create an outdoor room with a fresh sea breeze
- Kids can swim all day in the tiled solar heated pool, or run around on the wide north facing lawn
- Made for outdoor living the alfresco also features a TV connection, and a fire pit with seating
- A study nook sits at the façade by the stairs, with a media room which could also be used as a 5th bedroom
- Wash sandy feet after the beach in the downstairs bathroom, with the laundry right next door
- Contemporary glazing lights the staircase to access the upper level, with large family rumpus
- Parents have their own zone-able suite behind double doors, where a quiet retreat awaits
- A large balcony is accessible by sliding glass doors, with breathtaking You Yangs and Bay views
- Watch the activity across the water with passing jet skis, sail boats and ships en route to Geelong
- The master suite itself boasts a WIR, spacious bedroom and ensuite with a smaller private balcony
- 3 minor bedrooms conveniently bud off the rumpus, all with BIRs and sized well for growing kids
- The family bathroom is ready to tackle busy mornings, with wide vanity, bath and in situ shower
- Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling temper the climate through every season
- Triple car garage with internal and rear access, and gated side access for storing a caravan or boat
- A ducted vacuum system, and custom joinery providing ample storage caters well to daily life
- LED lighting, roman blinds fitted to windows and a neutral colour palette throughout
- Low maintenance gardens within retaining wall beds, paving and exposed aggregate driveway
- Enjoy the peace of rural surrounds, within a walk to shopping centres and Clifton Springs Primary
- Central to great surf beaches, wineries, and tourist attractions that make the Bellarine so popular
Be one of the lucky few to secure this outstanding position on the Curlewis waterfront, and call this stunning coastal sanctuary ‘home'. Arrange an inspection today.

Description:
FABULOUS DENNIS FAMILY HOME (635 SQM APP)....STYLE, FLAIR AND SPACE.
The proportions of every room are excellent , feels good , looks good. Large entrance through to open plan area which includes dining, spacious living and well designed gourmet kitchen , adjacent is rumpus or theatre room, both overlook the outdoor alfresco patio and BBQ area , the north facing orientation provides a light and bright aspect. Four bedrooms all with WIR'S , ensuite in main, central bathroom, laundry, powder room and separate toilet. Features include central heating, split system, stone benches, extra large walk in pantry, glass splashbacks, dishwasher, quality fixtures, solar panels, and fittings and more. The size of the block allows for double garage and another access with second freestanding garage, caravan/boat or other vehicles. This home is in a central position with access to transport schools, parklands , shopping complex and all other amenities. A real winner !

Description:
Make Your Move Now!
Stylish & just waiting to be yours. This steel framed JG King family 3 bedroom home will tick all the boxes. Large master bedroom has street views, walk in robe & ensuite. Tiles lead you to a light filled lounge room with garden views and adjacent is a spacious study featuring a built in desk. Kitchen has black stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances with a 5 burner gas cook top, electric wall oven plus a dish washer. Open plan tiled dining & carpeted 2nd lounge has sliding doors to your rear yard. Bedrooms 2 & 3 are on both on the big side completed by built in robes. Central bathroom includes a spa bath perfect to pamper yourself in with a seperate shower. Step outside to enjoy your undercover deck with clear cafe blinds to entertain in any weather. But wait there is more, gates divide the yard perfect for a portable pool or secure play area for kids or pets. A rare find is here is the double gates along the other side of the house with crushed rock just perfect to store your caravan, boat or trailer with sensor lights. Double car garage includes an abundance of built in storage cupboards with both internal access & door access to the backyard. There is still more additional features evaporative cooling, ducted heating, opticomm fibre internet, data points & alarm system. All sitting pretty on a 513m2 block in ever so popular Curlewis a short walk to primary school, future day care centre & local shops, cafes & 24 hour chemist.

Description:
Premier Bay Front Opportunity, 762sqm Corner Allotment, Exclusive Lifestyle
Presenting an exclusive beachfront opportunity. This generous 762sqm prime allotment is positioned in a prestigious estate designed and developed by the award winning Bisinella Developments. Boasting spectacular panoramic views across the bay to the You Yangs, never to be interrupted or built out and literally meters from the waters edge.
The prime corner allotment offers flexibility when considering and designing your dream family home. Positioning the garage crossover on Shoreline Drive will allow for a single storey dwelling while still maximising the views (STCA). This will also provide easy access and storage for boats, caravans and Jet Ski's etc.
This is the picture-perfect environment for all growing families offering amenities such as:
- Walking track directly down to the waters edge
- Quick and easy access to Clifton Springs boat ramp
- Zoning to reputable Secondary Schools in Drysdale
- Walking distance Supermarkets and medical facilities
- Short drive to Clifton Springs Golf Course
- Within close proximity to some of the best wineries on the Bellarine Peninsula
Opportunities to secure land of this size, in a location like this with arguably some of the best views across the peninsula are extremely rare in this market place. Enquire now and secure an exciting future for your family. I highly recommend inspecting this impressive parcel of land.

Description:
It’s all About Position
This charming family home is situated in the heart of the Curlewis Parks Estate. Conveniently located, directly across from Hermsley Park and just moments from all surrounding amenities. Established on an allotment of approximately 455m2, the floor plan is cleverly designed for optimal use of space.
At the front of the home a more intimate space exists in the form of a formal lounge, whilst towards the rear of the home you will find open plan living including a spacious meals and kitchen area. The kitchen showcasing ample storage, gas cook top and step in pantry to ensure catering for any occasion is a breeze.
Offering three bedrooms, the main bedroom boasting an ensuite and walk in robe. Bedrooms two and three are complete with built in robes, and serviced by a central bathroom with a separate toilet for optimal functionality.
A well-appointed north-west facing alfresco area complete with pull-down awnings allows for year round entertaining. The meticulously kept lawn and gardens add to the tranquillity of your own private sanctuary.
Completing the home is the double remote garage, gas central heating and spilt system cooling to ensure you are comfortable all year around.
This home would be perfect for those looking for a family home, investors or downsizers looking to minimise garden maintenance. Curlewis is constantly on the move and growing everyday, don’t miss your chance to secure the perfect lifestyle!

Description:
Who Says Size Doesn't Matter!
I simply cannot think of another property in today's market that boasts unrivalled 'size n scale' and yet still delivers a warm welcoming 'home' feel.
Positioned in what is quickly becoming known as the Paris end of Curlewis is this quality built 'one of a kind'. A free flowing open plan design was born from a building brief dedicated to establishing a family home of generous proportions which are further enhanced by high ceilings, excellent storage solutions and ALL the modern comforts.
The master bedroom is an enviable size and is complete with an ensuite and walk in robe. A northerly orientation ensures it is bathed in lovely natural light. The 2nd bedroom continues with the theme of generous proportions (3.8m x 3.5m approximately) and has floor to ceiling built in robes. The remaining 2 bedrooms also have built in robes.
The kitchen is a genuine 'headturner'; dual expansive Caesor stone bench tops compliment crisp white cabinetry and charcoal tiled splash back creates a lovely contrast. Stainless steel appliances and believe it or not a wrap around walk in pantry spans wall to wall (6m approximately) ensures this kitchen is one of the finest in today's property market. The kitchen is undoubtedly the hub of the family home and an open plan kitchen/family/meals ensures the home meets the practical needs of a growing family. A 2nd and separate living area offers further flexibility to what already is a very adaptable floor plan.
Glass sliding doors from the kitchen zone offer a lovely seamless connection to an expansive outdoor entertaining zone; complete with exposed aggregate concrete and a beautiful sheltered area for an early coffee or a late wine. Cool summer breezes from Corio Bay are a lovely reminder of how close you are to the water's edge.
A generous land holding of approximately 583m2 and frontage of 17.2m offers side access via dual colour bond gates.
A wonderful home ready for the next chapter!

WE CAN'T KEEP UP WITH THE DEMAND
As soon as we list a property in Curlewis we have lots of people wanting to be here. So don't delay on this one.
How do you fill in your time? Work some, play some, relax some? Your choice is made easy by selecting this location. Providing, leisure activities such as riding or walking, sport such as football, netball, dancing but the list is endless and personal.
A popular new suburb that's close to all that's required for a good and easy lifestyle. Surrounded by new homes and not far from a new spacious shopping centre, schools, boat ramp, golf course etc.
This newly built home is one out of the box, it's not like the rest. Check out the floor plan. Great open plan living overlooking an al fresco bringing the outside in. Good visibility to watch the kids play.
A home that would suit a first home buyer, young family, a downsizer or an investment. What are you looking for? What day and time would suit to view?

This beautiful home is filled with space and quality, upon entering the home the main bedroom situated at the front has full ensuite and walk in robes, opposite is the formal sitting room with the outlook across to the park.

This modern 4 year old home is a must to inspect and will certainly not disappoint anyone that views the property.

Description:
Curlewis Calling
Whether you are looking for the perfect family home or an ideal investment opportunity, you can’t go past 51 Creekside Drive, Curlewis. Showcasing modern facilities, spacious living and a convenient locale. Established on an allotment of approximately 511m2, the floor plan is cleverly designed for optimal use of space, with an undercover outdoor area for all all year round use.
Greeted by the formal lounge room upon entering the home, you begin to realise how much space this quality Henley built home has to offer.
Generous bedrooms complete with an abundance of storage in each. The main bedroom featuring an ensuite with his and her sinks and walk in robe. The remaining two bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet.
To the rear of the home, open plan entertaining is showcased with a sizable kitchen including an abundance of bench space, walk in pantry and gas stove top. Adjacent to the kitchen you will find the dining and rumpus room, a versatile space that could have a multitude of uses.
Proceeding outside, the undercover entertainment area overlooks the rear solar heated plunge pool making this yard the best place to hold a summer BBQ.
Other notable features of this home include climate controlled cooling, double remote garage and a separate laundry off the kitchen.
Situated just minutes from the Curlewis shopping precinct and just across from the Percy Cherry Park. Ideally located in the heart of Curlewis, this property is not one you will want to miss seeing!

Description:
Stylish Modern Living - A Dream Starter or Investment!
Conveniently located within close proximity of the Curlewis Shopping Centre, you will find this wonderfully positioned home in a quiet street that truly offers a magnificent lifestyle close to everything and packed with features you will enjoy well into the future.
A beautifully sleek, neutral interior offers the ideal setting for your personal touches, with a brilliant layout and large windows further contributing to the spacious floor plan of this home.
Featuring three generous bedrooms including the main bedroom appointed with walk in robe and ensuite. Bedrooms two and three fitted with built in robes.

Other features include ducted heating and split system cooling for year round comfort, double garage with internal access, contemporary interiors including neutral colour scheme, window furnishings, low maintenance gardens and much more.
Well located within easy distance to Drysdale Village, local Primary Schools, Christian College Bellarine, Geelong CBD in 15 minutes and all that the Bellarine has to offer including wineries, quality beaches and entertainment options.

Description:
A Wonderful Lifestyle Awaits - 2 Minute Stroll To The Beach
What an incredible opportunity you have here to secure the home of your dreams with this near new, 53 square home boasting noticeable quality fittings & fixtures throughout without the stress & costs of building. Situated only a minute's stroll from the stunning water via direct walkway access as well as a park & playground area which is perfect for growing families.
Boasting an impressive, light filled, open plan living, dining & kitchen area that opens on to an undercover concrete entertaining area via timber sliding doors with a ceiling fan which is perfect for entertaining throughout the whole year. The stunning contemporary chef's kitchen offers a huge walk in butler's pantry that also incorporates a stylish laundry with external access & built in storage. The kitchen boasts a vast amount of 40mm ceaserstone benches that continue through to the pantry & laundry, top of the line 'Smeg' stainless steel appliances including a double electric oven, dishwasher, gas 4 burner cook top, built in coffee machine & built in microwave, plus a large breakfast bar, double sink, instant boiling water tap & gorgeous pendant lighting with an abundance of built in cupboard space & storage offered throughout. Off the hallway is a fully equipped theatre & media room boasting a large built in projector & surround sound system on a tiered floored setup perfect for watching anything you desire as well as a spacious home office or potential 5th bedroom.
Upstairs leads you to an impressive further living space that offers built in robes & captures the stunning water views while relaxing on your couch, as well as granting access to a huge 6.5 x 6.5m undercover balcony with ceiling fan that also boasts beautiful views through to Melbourne across the bay. Offering 4 bedrooms upstairs, 3 of which offer built in robes that are serviced by the main bathroom, with the main bedroom offering a large walk in robe & spacious ensuite with an oversized shower, bath, double vanity with ceaserstone bench top, separate toilet & additional laundry chute. Extras throughout include a powder room downstairs, refrigerated cooling, gas central heating, blinds, surround sound speaker system internally & externally, understairs storage, a double lock up garage with internal access & a 5kw solar panel system that covers the majority of electricity bills.

Description:
Quality finish - large family home.
Situated in one of the finest estates on the Bellarine, this property offers everything the family needs and comprises 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 3 living areas, open plan kitchen dining, alfresco entertaining, 2 car garage, manicured landscapes and more.
Curlewis offers a short trip to a number of the peninsulas best attractions, including a number of quality golf courses, award winning wineries, historical sites, great beaches, regular markets, annual events AND Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington peninsula.
At the heart of the home the spacious designer kitchen gives the chef of the home full view of the main living spaces and boasts stone tops, walk in pantry, 900mmS/S appliances and dishwasher. An additional adjoining living area can be used as a rumpus room and a separate 3rd living space is ideal for the home theatre, home office or hobbies room.
The master bedroom found at the front of the home is massive and includes walk in wardrobe and full ensuite, whilst a further 3 bedrooms are at the other end of the home and all have built in robes.
Opening out from the main living area through stacker doors the under roof alfresco area is ideal for entertaining and is surrounded by low maintenance landscapes.
Additional features include: gas ducted heating, air conditioning, stone tops, solar panels, remote garage and more.
Properties of this calibre don't last long, so call Dion on 0424 940 629 to learn more today.

Description:
Perfect family home with parkland aspects
Located in the Bayview Estate, this immaculately maintained single level contemporary home with full render façade, will not disappoint the astute home buyer looking to move into Curlewis and embrace the lifestyle. The home offers 32 squares of living with a generous outdoor alfresco area and is situated on a comparatively large lot size of 511sqm. Incorporating a neutral palette throughout the home boasts a generous open-plan living and dining area including a stylishly appointed Caesar Stone kitchen with a large stainless steel free standing 5 burner oven, built in microwave, an additional storage room and a walk-in butler’s pantry, that adds the wow factor to the home. A second living area offers plenty additional space for the growing family to fully appreciate.Comprising of 4 bedrooms, plus 5th bedroom or large office space at the homes entrance could be the perfect place for a home business. Double doors open up to the master bedroom with a generous walk-in robe and ensuite whilst the other 3 spacious bedrooms all have built-in robes. The home is fully landscaped with low maintenance native gardens and well established fruit trees, herb garden and vegetable patch, is connected to the fibre optic network, double glazed windows and extra insulation help reduce the heat from the summer sun and retain warmth during winter working in combination with gas ducted heating throughout, along with a split system air conditioner. The home is also connected to a 3.5kw solar system as an additional benefit.
This superbly presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, the Percy Cherry Playground across the road, a walking track to the bay, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private & access to the Bellarine Peninsulas world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this prestigious location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Land size: 511 sqm approx.

Description:
Let Me Entertain You
If you are looking for a home that is big enough for the family but allows you to entertain year round, put this at the top of your list!
Just 4 years young this Porter Davis build is decked out with all the mod cons including an abundance of extras.
The fore of the home welcomes you with high ceilings and a wide hallway before entering the double doors through to the master suite including walk-in robe and full ensuite. The heart of the home is the expansive open plan kitchen meals and 1st living area. What makes this area so functional is the bifold doors providing the option to bring inside out and entertain in style. The custom kitchen includes stone bench tops, 900mm gas oven, custom window and stainless steel appliances overlooking the dining, living and outside area. The second living area/rumpus room also has sliding door access onto the undercover area. The rear of the home hosts the remaining 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes, main bathroom with tiled in bath and shower, separate toilet and laundry.
The undercover outdoor area and extended deck is the perfect place to entertain all year round, the garden shed and low maintenance gardens complete this fantastic home.
Features include, ducted heating, ceiling fans, feature walls, custom light fittings throughout, stone bench top, stainless steel appliances, storage facilities, floating floors, timber bifolds, extended deck area, garden shed, double lock up garage with remote access, internal/external access and garden shed.
Located in the ever popular growth corridor of Curlewis close to all amenities and just moments to the bay; this fantastic package is situated upon 481m2.
